name: eDirectory
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Arca Solutions eDirectory provides a php and .NET software platform to allow site owners to publish directory-driven websites with ease. - Hompage: http://www.edirectory.com/

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<blockquote class="eDirectoryVersion"><span class="basePowered">Powered by <a href="http:\/\/www\.edirectory\.com" target="_blank">eDirectory™<\/a> <\/span> v\.([^<^\s]+)<\/blockquote>)
